nodes.text: Omereth was an aquatic planet located in the galaxy. During the rule of the Eternal Empire, seismic activity brought a new archipelago to the surface of the world's oceans.

Omereth was created for Heir to the Jedi, a canon novel published in 2015. The planet was later referenced in the crew skill mission "The Tides of History" in Knights of the Eternal Throne, the 2016 Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, though the game is part of the Star Wars Legends continuity.
